definition: night scene/the dim light of night

sentences.english: Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 白晝是色彩繽紛的浮沫，於深邃的夜色中浮蕩。

sentences.english: As the night wears on, exhaustion overcomes their discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 隨着夜色深沉，疲憊最終戰勝了她們的不適。

sentences.english: Watching her walk away, I felt the enchantment of the night begin to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 看着她走遠，我頓感夜色的迷人開始消散。

sentences.english: Peering out his door into the night, he recognized the face of a trusted neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 他開門窺望，夜色中認出是一位可靠的鄰居。

sentences.english: I was a new born vampire, weeping at the beauty of the night.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個新生的吸血鬼，夜色之美令我哭。

sentences.english: He has a stern face and he simply nods before shooting off into the gathering darkness.
sentences.chinese: 他一臉嚴肅地點點頭，開車駛入越來越濃的夜色中。

sentences.english: Colorfully lit high- risers give off dazzling light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 多姿多彩的高樓大廈，在夜色中絢爛奪目。

sentences.english: I gaze after teacher, vanishes until she that beautiful back in the dim light of night.
sentences.chinese: 我目送老師，直到她那美麗的背影消失在夜色中。

sentences.english: Rainbarrow had again become blended with night .
sentences.chinese: 雨|又和夜色混成一體了。

sentences.english: The night is fair in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 這園中的夜色多麼迷人啊。

sentences.english: Hazy darkness, Yu-ming, another fellow from "The Fat Man, " the phone.
sentences.chinese: 朦朧夜色中，於得明接到另一位老鄉“胖子”的電話。

sentences.english: Five giant backdrops beckon the visitor into the Trianon garden by night.
sentences.chinese: 五面巨幅帷幕將參觀者引入夜色中的特里阿農園。

sentences.english: In the hot spring pool to enjoy the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 在夜色朦朧的溫泉池下賞月。

sentences.english: The night waned , and I worked hastily, but in silence.
sentences.chinese: 夜色闌珊，我麻利地忙活着，當然是悄無聲息。

definition: early evening when lanterns are first lit
